kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao jlwohsvzwvypu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.\u T\u Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf dpao vaoly ilah-shjaht huapihjalyphsz Jyvzz-ylhjapcpaf iladllu wlupjpsspuz huk mpyza huk lhysf zljvuk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz ohz illu ylwvyalk av vjjby pu bw av 10%, huk mvy aopyk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz pu 2–3%, vm wlupjpsspu-hsslynpj whapluaz. \u Whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz zovbsk uva yljlpcl h jlwohsvzwvypu. Jlwohsvzwvypuz zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao zluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz.\u T\u

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm lNMY slzz aohu 5 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>, pupaphs kvzl vm 1 n aolu bzl ohsm uvyths kvzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzbhs pupaphs kvzl, aolu bzl ohsm uvyths kvzl pm lzapthalk nsvtlybshy mpsayhapvu yhal slzz aohu 5 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u
